cqs: How many things may c1 do with dt1?
How many relations are available between c1 and dt1?
How many things could c1 do with dt1?
How many relations exist between c1 and dt1?
How many things can c1 do with dt1?
How many relations are described between c1 and dt1?
How many relations are proposed between c1 and dt1?
How many relations are there between c1 and dt1?
query: SELECT (COUNT(?x) AS ?cnt) WHERE { <c1> rdfs:subClassOf [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty ?x ; owl:hasValue <dt1> ] . }
